attributes.action: ensure that t20, a CCP employee should be sacked and BoB be banned from the game.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: t20 & BoB cheated in Eve. t20 should take responsibility for his actions and either quit or be sacked. Members of BoB knowingly accepting any information or items should also be permanently banned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
